name: Desecration (A. Christian Larsson)
description:
--------------------

Desecration is a student project made in the fall semester of 2020 at KADK. The aim of the project was for the students to learn as many new skills as possible during the process of the creation of the game. While making Desecration the students got to explore shaders, particle effects, scripting, sound design, concept art and modeling. 

The project has no plans to be updated and only serves as a portfolio piece. 

--------------------

Desecration is a top down hack and slash action game where the player finds themselves in the role as a lone gunslinger who must face the demonic forces which haunts these lands. Set out in the world and remove the evil that haunts this world aided by your blade and firearm. 


--------------------

Credits:

Shaders, programming, effects, sound, additional 2D/3D art: A. Christian Larsson
Concept art, modeling, Q&A: Troels Jorgensen
